Introduction
This topic contains instructions for processing cases that require an election of FEC or VA benefits, including
responsibility for requesting an election
determining whether a claimant might be entitled to FEC
processing a claim for VA benefits when the claimant has also filed a claim for FEC
processing an election of FEC that becomes available prior to authorization of a decision on a claim for VA benefits
adjusting a running award because a beneficiary elected FEC
process for handling an election of VA disability compensation after OWCP awarded FEC
processing an election of VA benefits based on death during military service
, and
adjusting an award when the Veteran is in receipt of military retired pay (MRP)
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 5 - Federal Employeesâ€™ Compensation (FEC)
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section None
